doc.text_encoder: text encoder config, if properties are null copies from unet config
doc.text_encoder_lr_scale: if LR not set on text encoder, sets the Lr to a multiple of the Unet LR. for example, if unet `lr` is 2e-6 and `text_encoder_lr_scale` is 0.5, the text encoder's LR will be set to `1e-6`.
doc.optimizer_desc: 'adamw' in standard 32bit, 'adamw8bit' is bitsandbytes, 'lion' is lucidrains
doc.lr: learning rate, if null will use CLI or main JSON config value
doc.lr_scheduler: overrides global lr scheduler from main config
doc.betas: exponential decay rates for the moment estimates
doc.epsilon: value added to denominator for numerical stability, unused for lion
